00003 def exists(env):
00004         return true
00005 
00006 def generate(env):
00007 
00008         def Check_libpcre(context):
00009                 import SCons.Util
00010                 context.Message('Checking for libpcre ... ')
00011                 ret = context.TryAction('pcre-config --version')[0]
00012                 if ret: 
00013                         env['CACHED_PCRE'] = 1;
00014                         env['CXXFLAGS_PCRE'] = SCons.Util.CLVar( 
00015                                         os.popen('pcre-config --cflags').read().strip() )
00016                         env['LINKFLAGS_PCRE'] = SCons.Util.CLVar( 
00017                                         os.popen('pcre-config --libs').read().strip() )
00018                 else:
00019                         env['CACHED_PCRE'] = 0;
00020                 context.Result(ret)
00021                 return ret
00022 
00023         from SCons.Options import Options
00024         import os
00025 
00026         optionFile = env['CACHEDIR'] + 'libpcre.cache.py'
00027         opts = Options(optionFile)
00028         opts.AddOptions(
00029                 ('CACHED_PCRE', 'Whether libpcre is available'),
00030                 ('CXXFLAGS_PCRE',''),
00031                 ('LINKFLAGS_PCRE',''),
00032                 )
00033         opts.Update(env)
00034         if not env['HELP'] and (env['_CONFIGURE_'] or not env.has_key('CACHED_PCRE')):
00035                 conf = env.Configure(custom_tests =      { 'Check_libpcre' : Check_libpcre } )
00036 
00037                 if not conf.Check_libpcre():
00038                         print 'libpcre not found .'
00039 
00040                 env = conf.Finish()
00041                 opts.Save(optionFile, env)
